message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I'm looking for $20000 for it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $15000 for the product.
I understand that you have budget constraints, but I'm confident that this product is worth more than $15000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $18000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product.
I'm still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to compromise further. I'll meet you at $17000, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $16500 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your target, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $17500, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $17000 for the product.
I'm not willing to give up much more, Bob. I'll meet you at $17250, but that's my final offer.
Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final price of $17000 for the product.
